entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 23. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Clearing this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 23. Wind chill minus 37 this morning and minus 31 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 33.

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High minus 19.
